channel.title: Sorry for the last post "I" made in here
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I'd like to point out that [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,539087.msg3944930.html]this[/url] post WAS NOT ME!
I apparently was hacked at some point. I'll post proof in a minute.
Again, I'm sorry for this post and my rep did take a beating from it. lol.
--Getting images --
EDIT: heres proof; (Edited my IP so no one knows it but obviously the mods+ and myself.) [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/31065410/Other/images/fml.png[/img]

item.title: Sorry for the last post "I" made in here
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Tree:

@JavaTC: Jog on you naive moron. You’re completely misinformed and clearly have no long history here. You’re opinion is worthless. I piss in the mouths of people like you. Now hush.

Enlighten me, do tell what you’ve done here that makes you so alpha. Because I’m sure text on a database will effect my opinion on the egos of dicks like you as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Sorry for the last post "I" made in here
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“Stupit, post:49, topic:436647”][quote author=Tree link=topic=539363.msg3947921#msg3947921 date=1332035832]
Holy fuck. You’re all so fucking stupid.
Like i seriously try to make an effort to be helpful, but you’re like a group of disabled monkeys.

@skaternewfag348: Nobody gives a flying fuck. You’re a nobody. I don’t care what you post or what reputation you lose. Just another idiot who got burnt by the community. Now jog on.
[/quote]
Says the one that bitched to Trevor so much about some stupid fucking titles. Who gives a shit?[/quote]

Only so my credibility is shown. Power, awards and titles mean everything to these lesser people and that’s where i find my fun. Elitism is my hobby, those are my tools of sorts. Reputation means nothing.
Plus, you hardly know about anything that’s happened between him and myself.

Thanks for the input.

[quote=“JavaTC, post:50, topic:436647”][quote author=Tree link=topic=539363.msg3947921#msg3947921 date=1332035832]
Holy fuck. You’re all so fucking stupid.
Like i seriously try to make an effort to be helpful, but you’re like a group of disabled monkeys.

@skaternewfag348: Nobody gives a flying fuck. You’re a nobody. I don’t care what you post or what reputation you lose. Just another idiot who got burnt by the community. Now jog on.
[/quote]
I haven’t seen any posts by you on either topics…?
You’re a fucking dick mate, and being moparian doesn’t mean you can give people shit. I hate the OP, I hate ALLOT of people on this site, but at least I don’t sit here and swear endlessly at them.[/quote]

This is why i want my awards and ranks back. Do you see now? My ego doesn’t seem justified unless they know of my past achievements. Perfect example.

@JavaTC: Jog on you naive moron. You’re completely misinformed and clearly have no long history here. You’re opinion is worthless. I piss in the mouths of people like you. Now hush.

Read full topic

If he really was hacked, he could just change his password, be smarter, and move on. There is no need for a “I was hacked, sorry” thread.

There is a reason I said “if he was really hacked”.
